Expertise.SectionDescription: Things I've learned along the way
Expertise.Description1: 6+ years of experience working on high-impact user and developer-facing products including web applications, APIs, and SDKs.

About.SectionDescription: Few words about me and my journey
About.Title: Technical Product Manager + Product Owner & Scrum Master Certified
About.Paragraph1: I lead products, projects, and sprints, ensuring high-quality delivery as well as exercising collaborative team and stakeholder management.
About.Paragraph2: I strive to always be up to speed on different topics including coding and design to be able to deliver and discuss with all stakeholders.
